items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

items.content_html: Froovo is a modern, modular, ultra-lightweight web server written in TypeScript. Designed to deliver exceptional performance with a clean and flexible framework, it is ideal for modern APIs, real-time services and high-performance web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight, no-frills note-taking app that runs in your browser. Notes save automatically to localStorage, persist after refresh, and can be deleted with a double-click. Built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Perfect for quick reminders without leaving your browser.

Notes save automatically to localStorage, persist after refresh, and can be deleted with a double-click. Built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Perfect for quick reminders without leaving your browser.
